TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Serzh_Azati_Sargsyan, title = Serzh_Azati_Sargsyan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serzh_Azati_Sargsyan} }

S.FORM: == Serzh Azati Sargsyan == ryax sa tay 30 nqu tay 6, Serzh Azati Sargsyan, squliq na sezi'. (minhtuw sa kawas tay 1954) mrhuw Armenia ta' misuw hya' ga Serzh Azati Sargsyan, aring ryax tay 9 squ byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2008 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. qnxan nya Serzh Azati Sargsyan maki tay kawas 1983 msqun ki Rita Sargsyan, tehuk misuw qani. Rita Sargsyan ga, kneril ni Serzh Azati Sargsyan. pinqbaqan nya Serzh Azati Sargsyan, t'aring kawas tay 1971 tehuk kawas tay 1979, mqwas biru sa Yerevan State University pqwsan biru krahu. mintzyuwaw nya Serzh Azati Sargsyan sa kawas 1990, t'aring mtzyuwaw zyuwaw na sezi. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru'

== Serzh Azati Sargsyan == ryax sa tay 30 nqo tay 6, Serzh Azati Sargsyan, sqoliq na sezi'. (minhtow sa kawas tay 1954) mrhow Armenia ta' misow hya' ga Serzh Azati Sargsyan, aring ryax tay 9 sqo byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2008 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. qnxan nya Serzh Azati Sargsyan maki tay kawas 1983 msqon ki Rita Sargsyan, tehok misow qani. Rita Sargsyan ga, kneril ni Serzh Azati Sargsyan. pinqbaqan nya Serzh Azati Sargsyan, t'aring kawas tay 1971 tehok kawas tay 1979, mqwas biro sa Yerevan State University pqwsan biro kraho. mintzyowaw nya Serzh Azati Sargsyan sa kawas 1990, t'aring mtzyowaw zyowaw na sezi. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro'
